original: @67a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @67a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sems can tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la /
analyzed: sems can tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la /
translated: The ritual for extending the life of a sentient being whose life is exhausted: the practitioner who is endowed with the commitments should set up the maṇḍala as before.

original: bum pa gcig la dpa' bo chen po'i phyag mtshan btab la der rdo rje mig gis bltas te bgegs bskrad la rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te /
analyzed: bum pa gcig la dpa' bo chen po'i phyag mtshan btab la der rdo rje mig gis bltas te bgegs bskrad la rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te /
translated: In one vase, having imprinted the hand implements of the great heroes, having looked with the vajra eye, having expelled the obstructors, having performed the yoga of one’s deity,

original: khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can aa dkar por bsdus la de nyid las 'od 'phros pas lha mo dkar mo lag na tshe'i bum pa thogs pa grangs med pa spros la /
analyzed: khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can aa dkar por bsdus la de nyid las 'od 'phros pas lha mo dkar mo lag na tshe'i bum pa thogs pa grangs med pa spros la /
translated: one should gather the sentient beings who abide in the three realms into a white A. Light radiating from that emanates countless white goddesses holding vases of life.

original: de la mchod pas mchod la 'chi ba'i ltas byung ba'i 'gro ba de la bstims pas mdangs nges par 'jug go //
analyzed: de la mchod pas mchod la 'chi ba'i ltas byung ba'i 'gro ba de la bstims pas mdangs nges par 'jug go //
translated: Having made offerings to them, they dissolve into the living being who has the signs of death. Vitality will definitely enter.

original: de lta bu byas na ni lo gcig tu tshe bsring bar nges so //
analyzed: de lta bu byas na ni lo gcig tu tshe bsring bar nges so //
translated: If one does it in that way, it is certain that life will be extended for one year.

original: tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga rgyun gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga rgyun gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
translated: The Ritual for Extending the Life of One Whose Life is Exhausted: The Wheel of the Continuum

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of the master Jñāna-vajra is complete.
